allergyRecordList.allergyRemark: Initially having skin rash. After 30 minutes, more serious signs appeared. Started to have tightness of chess, dizziness, trouble breathing, hoarse voice, swollen lips and tongue. (Anaphylaxis shock?)Taken piriton when skin rash was found. When serious signs appeared, she called 999 for emergency medical help and was admitted to the hospital. Injection (Epinephrine?) was given in the ambulance. Symptoms were relieved after injection. She has stayed in the hospital for 2 days for observation.
